name: Melody Maverick
description:
Melody Maverick is a pixel art arcade shooting game where you play as Maverick, a trustworthy sheriff who has to defeat bandits with his not-so-trustworthy iron that only deals damage when the shots line up with the music’s rhythm.

Controls:

LMB = Shoot

RMB = Reload

Intro / Enter / F11 = Toggle Fullscreen

Credits:

Art made by: @LuiSTopYT & @emnrxs

Spaghetti code by: @emnrxs

Versions:

 V3 is the version submitted to the jam, in V4 several bugs were fixed and the difficulty was lowered by:

  • increasing the miss window from 90 to 100ms
  • re-adding the previously removed metronome
  • adding a score indicator
  • making the flying heart hitbox bigger
  • making the enemy hitbox bigger
